body.name: Electric Toothbrush for Adults with 8 Brush Heads, Sonic Toothbrush Rechargeable with a Holder & Travel Case, 2.5 Hours Charge for 120 Days Use - Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: Superior Clean and Healthier Gums - Up to 40,000 VPM high vibration sonic toothbrush. Remove up to 99.99% of plaque and stains for a deep clean along the gumline and between the teeth. With soft flexible sides, the bristles contour to the shape of each tooth's surface to provide 4x more surface contact and remove up to 10x more plaque from hard-to-reach areas for a deep clean.

5 High-PERFORMANCE MODES- Sonic electric toothbrush has 5 modes. Clean: For daily cleaning; Sensitive: Softer cleaning for sensitive; Whitening: Remove surface stains; Polishing: 1-minute whitening teeth; Massage: For gum care. To accommodate different teeth and gum conditions for different cleaning and care needs.

120 Days Battery Life - Rechargeable electronic toothbrush lasts up to 120 days on a 2.5-hour charge. The sonic toothbrush features a low battery indicator that flashes red when it is low and ultra-fast USB charging. The included USB-C cable (adapter not included) replaces the bulky charging base, so you don't have to worry about losing your charging cable and is compatible with any other USB-C cable you may have at home.

2-Mins Timer and IPX7 Waterproof - Built-in smart timer control, 30-second intervals reminding you to move to the next quadrant of your mouth, and total in 2 minutes, 4 quadrants. The reminder function ensures a scientifically recommended brushing time. IPX7 waterproof design Feel free to use your electric toothbrush safely in the shower or bath.

8 Replacement Brush Heads for 2 Years - Replacement brush heads will be available in 2 months, so don't worry about not getting them. Fronix electric toothbrush for adults is designed to fit the shape of your teeth and thoroughly clean gums and hard-to-reach areas. Includes 2 sensitive brush heads and 6 cleaning brush heads for different gums-type needs. Each brush head can be used for 3-4 months, so 8 brush heads will last approximately 2 years.

Travel Portable & Holder Included - The rechargeable toothbrush includes a handy hard-shell travel case made from BPA-free plastic that holds two brush heads. The extra-long battery life lasts up to 120 days on a full charge, so it's perfect for on-the-go traveling along with the travel case. It also includes a toothbrush holder to keep your toothbrush clean and away from moisture. It makes a perfect gift for yourself, your family, or your friends.
Package Contains - 1* Electric toothbrush, 6* Dupont toothbrush heads, 2 * Sensitive toothbrush heads,1*Toothbrush holder, 1*Travel case, 1* USB-C cable, 1* Instruction manual.
2 Years Warranty & Serve Kindly - If you have any questions, please contact us. Even if the return window closes, and you will receive prompt, friendly customer service.

Can this electric toothbrush be used by more than one user? Yes. The patterned colour of the brush head can be used to differentiate users when family members share the handle. How long can be used after fully charge? This sonic electric toothbrush can be fully charged quickly in 2.5 hours and has a battery life of around 120 days, making it great for long term travelling. How often should I replace the brush head on my electric toothbrush? Dentists recommend changing the brush head every 3 months. Where can I buy replacement toothbrush heads? Fronix electric toothbrush comes with 8 replacement heads for 2 years of use. Extra replacement brush heads will be available in 2 months, so don't worry about not getting them. What's in the Package? 1 Sonic Toothbrush with Instruction Manual 1 Travel Case 8 Toothbrush Heads 1 Toothbrush Holder 1 USB -C Cable (Adaptor not Included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly comparable to Fairywill Electric Toothbrush Power Sonic Cleaning
reviews.reviewText: I was in search of a new toothbrush after my Fairywill toothbrush stopped working after 3 years of purchasing it. I could not find this, product no longer on Amazon. I decided to give this one a try, after reading the reviews, specs and details of this product.I must say it’s, highly recommended not only this but comparable to the Fairywill electric toothbrush powerful sonic cleaning. One con with Fairywill is that it took the toothbrush a minimum of 4 hours to charge another con is that it only runs for 2 minutes before it turns itself off.Pro for both Fronix and Fairywill is that they both have 40,000 strokes per minute, 5 brushing modes, IPX7 waterproof to name a few.Where the Fronix S5 series Sonic Electric Toothbrush the charging time is literally cut down in half for the charging time by 2 hours, long lasting battery life for 30 days. The only downside for me is that it does not come with a toothbrush head cover, but you can find those easily on Amazon, eBay, or other sites. But it comes in super handy for those who travel, since it comes with a travel case, I also like the feature that it comes with a toothbrush holder, it works similar to the “Command Strips” all for a reasonable price. Thumbs up from me! Thank you Fronix team!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how it works, only thing is it doesn’t come with a 2-minute timer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Long battery life and plenty of extra heads came with it. Great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great find!!!
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is awesome!!Comfortable, easy to use. The cleaning power is excellent and the battery performance is outstanding! I am hooked.If you are looking, this is the toothbrush for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using electric toothbrushes for a few years and I thought my prior one was really good, but this one is so much better, it’s stronger and does a great job of cleaning my teeth. I will never go back to a manual toothbrush after this experience. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: This electronic toothbrush does the job. I do enjoy the multiple options for toothbrushing. Also include additional toothbrush heads in the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these and couldn’t be happier with them. Don’t let the low price fool you. I don’t know what an expensive one would be like, but I can’t imagine it being better than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loooooong battery life!
reviews.reviewText: My husband swears by this toothbrush. He says that a charge can last a month! I don't know if he has really proven this using a calendar, but it seems to be true, if not longer. After he used it for a couple of few years, it died, and would no longer charge. But it was so incredibly cheap, that he gleefully purchased another exact model to replace it. In every way it seems to be as good as my sonicare was.
